mapper.insert:
insert into audit (id, user_id, req_date, domain_id, req_ip, req_uuid, req_url, req_seq, req_class, req_method, req_success, req_exp, req_elapse, req_param, req_result, tenancy_id, request_domain_code ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.reqDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reqIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.reqClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqSuccess,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.reqExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqElapse,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.reqParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tenancyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.requestDomainCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
